question: My entrance test for the university are very close , I m working really hard ... Please tell me some Duaa to recite as soon as possible
answer:
QUESTION
My entrance test for the university are very close , I m working really hard for them but don?t think so that I m going to get admitted, coz the number of candidates is too much . Please tell me some Duaa to recite as soon as possible, so that I get the admission. I shall be extremely thankful! for them but don?t think so that I m going to get admitted , coz the number of candidates is too much. Please tell me some Duaa to recite as soon as possible, so that I get the admission. I shall be extremely thankful !
ANSWER


Share:
Recite, ?Rabb inniy maghloobun fantasir? as much as possible.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
